summary: This document is an email chain forwarding an OVS (Office for Victims of Crime) claim application related to Jeffrey Epstein. It involves a trial attorney from Edwards Pottinger LLC communicating about the application process for an unnamed individual.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The email chain is forwarding an OVS claim application related to him, indicating a victim compensation process is underway.

events.title: OVS application submission
events.description: An OVS (Office for Victims of Crime) claim application related to Jeffrey Epstein was sent by a trial attorney.

events.title: Forwarding of OVS application
events.description: The OVS claim application related to Jeffrey Epstein was forwarded via email.

keyFacts: An OVS (Office for Victims of Crime) claim application related to Jeffrey Epstein was being processed.
The correspondence involves a trial attorney from the law firm Edwards Pottinger LLC.
The email indicates a victim compensation process was underway for an unnamed individual related to the Epstein case.
